State Highway 25 truck crash brings live power lines down on road https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-25-truck-crash-brings-live-power-lines-down-on-road/F73YTKSU3NH4HF6EHBXXMZDYLA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-25-truck-crash-brings-live-power-lines-down-on-road/F73YTKSU3NH4HF6EHBXXMZDYLA/ The highway is down to one lane between Whangamata and Whiritoa. Tue, 16 Apr 2024 00:47:58 +0000 A truck crash has blocked one lane of State Highway 25 south of Whangamata.
Far North news in brief: Double Lotto luck; fire restrictions in place and clubhouse opens https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-news-in-brief-double-lotto-luck-fire-restrictions-in-place-and-clubhouse-opens/TM3ONR5DNJD2BDSPMUA5BNPPWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-news-in-brief-double-lotto-luck-fire-restrictions-in-place-and-clubhouse-opens/TM3ONR5DNJD2BDSPMUA5BNPPWU/News snippets from the Far North Tue, 16 Apr 2024 00:29:12 +0000 Lotto second division-winning tickets worth $12,697 each have been sold in the Far North.
Person dies following workplace incident at Ashburton farmhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-dies-following-workplace-incident-at-ashburton-farm/OIGAKUMQFJDUXAXGRHAG67WJUU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-dies-following-workplace-incident-at-ashburton-farm/OIGAKUMQFJDUXAXGRHAG67WJUU/ Pierre NixonThe Herald understands the incident occurred at Anwick Farms on Singletree Rd. Tue, 16 Apr 2024 00:15:19 +0000 A person has died following a workplace incident at a property in Newland, Ashburton District this morning. Photo / George Heard
Ultramarathon legend: Hawke’s Bay reserve soldier Sergeant Andrew McCrory raises thousands for charity https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/ultramarathon-legend-hawkes-bay-reserve-soldier-sergeant-andrew-mccrory-raises-thousands-for-charity/6UJCEQESIFG2ZBUPC45Z2QIWBQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/ultramarathon-legend-hawkes-bay-reserve-soldier-sergeant-andrew-mccrory-raises-thousands-for-charity/6UJCEQESIFG2ZBUPC45Z2QIWBQ/ A drive to push himself and help those who couldn't saw Andrew McCrory change lives. Tue, 16 Apr 2024 00:11:03 +0000 Sergeant Andrew McCrory with Liv, a lifelong friend who sparked his fundraising journey. Photo / NZ Defence Force
Ōmokoroa, Te Puke and Katikati town centre speeds to be reduced to 40km/h https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/omokoroa-te-puke-and-katikati-town-centre-speeds-to-be-reduced-to-40km/VJSN2JBQP5D6PERVODETDMF5II/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/omokoroa-te-puke-and-katikati-town-centre-speeds-to-be-reduced-to-40km/VJSN2JBQP5D6PERVODETDMF5II/ It is likely the new speed limits will come into effect within the next two years. Tue, 16 Apr 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Katikati’s main road is a state highway and NZTA intends to introduce a 40km/h speed limit.
Shannon farm hosts Red Poll cattle enthusiasts from around the world https://www.nzherald.co.nz/horowhenua-chronicle/news/shannon-farm-hosts-red-poll-cattle-enthusiasts-from-around-the-world/6ZTNELSRGREONCVJZSZFN3UFDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/horowhenua-chronicle/news/shannon-farm-hosts-red-poll-cattle-enthusiasts-from-around-the-world/6ZTNELSRGREONCVJZSZFN3UFDM/ Janine BaalbergenDelegation in New Zealand to talk about their favourite stock. Tue, 16 Apr 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Some of Kelvin and Cath Lane's Red Poll cattle.
Authorities refuse to enforce Brynderwyns detour ban following truck crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/authorities-refuse-to-enforce-brynderwyns-detour-ban-following-truck-crash/R6ANOOAIPVF2RBMO2SBXGV6XTI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/authorities-refuse-to-enforce-brynderwyns-detour-ban-following-truck-crash/R6ANOOAIPVF2RBMO2SBXGV6XTI/ Jenny Ling“These particular two corners are just not suitable for truck and trailers." Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:53:22 +0000 This truck got stuck on Cove Rd, Mangawhai, blocking both lanes last week. Authorities are yet to take action towards the truck company.
MPI officers uplift contaminated cheese bought from Woolworths, Whangārei https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/mpi-officers-uplift-contamerated-cheese-bought-from-woolworths-whangarei/QRCXAKHV55APJH2PC2S2R34KYE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/mpi-officers-uplift-contamerated-cheese-bought-from-woolworths-whangarei/QRCXAKHV55APJH2PC2S2R34KYE/ Sarah CurtisMPI officers have taken away a cockroach-infested block of cheese from a shopper. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:30:00 +0000 Onerahi pensioner Ian Score recently bought a block of Woolworths Everyday brand cheese from the supermarket's Okara Park store. When he got it home, he discovered cockroaches in it. Photo / Michael Cunningham
Shearing: Luke Vernon claims world record eight-hour Merino ewes title https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/shearing-luke-vernon-claims-world-record-eight-hour-merino-ewes-title/Q7DC33OH7NA5ZPQZJJXMSC2FZU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/shearing-luke-vernon-claims-world-record-eight-hour-merino-ewes-title/Q7DC33OH7NA5ZPQZJJXMSC2FZU/ Doug LaingNot a bad effort for someone who reckoned he shore 'like s***'. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:16:59 +0000 Michael-James “MJ” Terry (left) watches Luke Vernon on his way to being the first person to shear 500 Merino ewes in eight hours. Photo / Rocky Wegne
Hawke’s Bay news in brief: Strengthening works will require diversion at temporary Redclyffe Bridge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-news-in-brief-strengthening-works-will-require-diversion-at-temporary-redclyffe-bridge/TIV4HJAAKFFRJPDBM5HBQZULAM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-news-in-brief-strengthening-works-will-require-diversion-at-temporary-redclyffe-bridge/TIV4HJAAKFFRJPDBM5HBQZULAM/ Diversions will be in place at the temporary Redclyffe Bridge in the first half of May. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:13:45 +0000 Motorists can expect diversions at the temporary Redclyffe Bridge in the first half of May as strengthening works take place. Photo / Warren Buckland
